page.title: 01BROADBRIDGE HEATH AREA
page.content: Broadbridge Heath is a{newly {developed area.}It used to be a quiet village with a busy main road running through.Now it is a very populated but practically traffic free village.This has happened mainly because of the building of the{new by-pass.}The village is growing all the time.{New {houses}are still being built which means that the village is increasing in population. The development of the{industrial {estate}is increasing slowly. A{new {hypermarket}will be built which will be more convenient for the villagers. There is a{small Sports Centre}and a new Happy Eater restaurant for travellers next to a large garage. The noticable aspects of the countryside to the west of the village are the number of{sheep farms}and the fields of{rape.}
